import { Component, ComponentFactoryResolver, HostListener,ComponentRef, ViewChildren, QueryList } from '@angular/core'; import { AddEmployeeComponent } from './add-employee/add-employee.component'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ApiManagementService } from './Service/api-management.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'frontend'; @ViewChildren(AddEmployeeComponent) childGames !: QueryList constructor(public service : ApiManagementService){} ngOnInit() { this.service.getAllEmployee() } resetForm() { this.childGames.first.AddEmp.reset() this.childGames.first.submitted=false } deleteAllEmployee(){ this.service.deleteAllEmployee().subscribe(response=>{ console.log("Deleted") }) setTimeout(()=>{ this.service.getAllEmployee() },500) } }
